name: Forage (Alioth)
description:
A top down survival and ecological simulation game made for the McGill Game Dev club Game Jam on 13 November 2017. Choose from between 3 species each with a unique ability and distinct traits to fill a different ecological niche. Try to survive as long as possible and produce as many offspring as you can.

The theme for this Game Jam was to create a 2-button game. Your creature constantly moves forward in the game, and you can use [A] or [D] to turn left or right respectively. Pressing [A] + [D] together activates your unique ability. The same controls are used to navigate menus.

Current Version: 1.0.2

Release: 13.11.2017
